scripts.build: npm run build:browser && npm run build:node
scripts.br: cd browser && rm -rf build && node build.js && npx http-server -o browser/index-browser.html
scripts.nd: cd node && rm -rf build index-node.html _assets && node build.js && node node.js && cp /Users/martyanov-av/WebstormProjects/diplodoc/extensions/page-constructor/build/runtime/index.js.map /Users/martyanov-av/WebstormProjects/diplodoc/extensions/page-constructor/example/node/build/index.js.map && npx http-server -o ./node/index-node.html
